titles.title: 630 There's A Man In The Glory (familiar hymn of t

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
F
There's a Man in the glory
Whose Life is for me
He's pure and He's holy
Triumphant and free
He's wise and He's loving
How tender is He

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
His Life in the glory
My life must be
His Life in the glory
My life must be

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
There's a Man in the glory
Whose Life is for me
He overcame Satan
From bondage He's free
In Life he is reigning
How kingly is He

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines:
His life in the glory
My life must be
His life in the glory
My life must be

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
There's a Man in the glory
Whose Life is for me
In Him is no sickness
No weakness has He
He's strong and in vigor
How buoyant is He

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
His life in the glory
My life may be
His life in the glory
My life may be

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
There's a Man in the glory
Whose Life is for me
His peace is abiding
How patient is He
He's joyful and radiant
Expecting to see

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
His life in the glory
Lived out in me
His life in the glory
Lived out in me
